summary: This is a standalone version for the shrouded robes replacement by trinciamosche.
descriptionHtml:
This is a standalone version of trinciamosche shrouded robes replacement. 

His original mod can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14475

They can be crafted at the tanning rack and are classified as clothing. I created this mod to not only get more mage gear, but for some reason shrouded robes and handwraps break the mage armor perk. Making a standalone was the only way to fix that. 

v 1.3
Added a quick retex with a DB insignia on the shoulder.

v 1.2
Added a light armor version that is craftable under the steel section. Requires advanced armor perk.

For those of you who want the backstab enchantment I use the EzE mod by  xeightballx at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8157
author: Asharo
